Title: April camping
Content: So bought this beauty last September been dying to try it out watch tons of YouTube clips on setting it.  First of all it is brease to put up. I am 6â€™5 tall which meant i was touching the ends but with fact in pitch first and separate fly sheet i did not get wet there was condensation between the inner and outer but insife was bone dry. Things i would next time guild lines i never used them as i ft there was no wind. Maybe if pegged it the outer would be more effervescent against condensation but i had top on doir open and the outer closed my first two nights csmping ok little cold but ok this ten would sleep three but for one big like me it is a palice. Things i eould take next double air bed. There is loads if room for one. This tent is great floor is thick abd goes up the sides by about75mm so you should br dry when you wake up. I cant wait to use it again.
